Your ship, crew and cargo are lost. Cross them off the Ship’s Manifest. The waves close over your head and your only thought now is to save yourself. .
If the score is greater than your Rank, you are drowned - .
If the score is less than or equal to your Rank, you are swept miraculously towards the shore. Lose 1-6 Stamina points and (if you can survive that) .
